name: Ballad of the Frogs
description: Highlights *Low damage *Area effect *Reduces enemy defenses Details A phantasmal swamp bubbles up from the ground. Enemies within it suffer -4 Reflex for 3 rounds (no save) and 2 Poison Damage for each level the witch has up to and including Level 3. A DC 11 Will save halves this amount.

name: Ballad of the Jays
description: Highlights *Moderate damage *Area effect *May reduce enemy accuracy Details The witch whips up a brutal, cold wind carrying the harsh cries of jays. Targeted enemies take 2-3 Cold Damage for each level the witch has after Level 2, up to and including Level 4. They also suffer -1 Attack Bonus for 3 rounds. Successful DC 12 Will saves halve the damage and negate the penalty.

name: Defy the Snake
description: Highlights *Minor healing *Improved defenses Details The witch casts a warding circle, regaining 1 HP and gaining +4 AC, Fortitude, Reflex, and Will for 1 round.

name: Divine Folly
description: The adventurer takes -4 AC, Will, Reflex, and Fortitude until the end of their next turn to gain +4 Attack Bonus for the current turn.

name: Experimental Rifle
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Feint
description: The adventurer feints to prepare a more telling blow. An enemy within 1 square take -50% Physical Resistance for the current round.

name: Fireball
description: A fireball launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

name: Fizzled Explosive
description: The adventurer launches a cobbled-together grenade meant to decimate a swath of foes, but it fizzles. One enemy within 4 squares takes 1d3+1 Acid Damage, 1d2 Fire Damage+1, and 1d2+1 Electricity Damage. The enemy makes a DC 12 Reflex save for each damage type and avoids damage from that type if successful.

name: Ghostpowder
description: The adventurer throws a flask of paralysis-inducing ghostpowder at a point within 4 squares. All creatures within 1 square of the target square suffer 1 poison damage and must succeed on a DC 11 Reflex or be immobilized for 2-3 rounds.

name: Headbutt
description: The adventurer headbutts their foe, automatically hitting for 1d4 + 4 Physical Damage. A target failing a DC 12 Reflex save is also immobilized for 2 rounds.

name: Hedge Wizard's Arrow
description: The adventurer sends forth an arrow of discordium that hits an enemy within 5 squares for 1d3+3 Magic Damage.

name: Hold
description: Holds one target for 3 rounds

name: Horologos of Epitakus
description: The adventurer distorts time for all enemies within 5 squares, making them unable to move or take actions for 1 round (no save).

name: Ice Storm
description: An ice storm launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level.

name: Knottweed
description: Highlights *Low damage *Area effect *May immobilize enemies Details Noxious weeds enwrap Knott's enemies. The plants do 2 Poison Damage and immobilize enemies who fail a DC 11 Reflex save. Damage increases as Knott gains levels.

name: Itinerant of Even Greater Renown
description: The adventurer gains +2 Attack Bonus and +2 Damage Modifier for the current turn and +2 to all defenses for 1 round.

name: Itinerant of Renown
description: The adventurer gains +1 Attack Bonus and +1 Damage Modifier for the current turn and +1 to all defenses for 1 round.

name: Javelin
description: The adventurer quickly hurls a javelin too awkward to wield in normal combat, doing 3d4+4 Physical Damage to an enemy within 4 squares. A DC 13 Reflex save halves this sum.

name: Kroixia's Lesser Rift
description: The adventurer uses discordium to create an objectively existent, fleeting rift between perceived and ideal realities, doing 1d4+1 Magic Damage to creatures in a 5-square line and immobilizing them for 1 round. Successful DC 11 Fortitude saves halve damage and prevent immobility.

name: La Belle Dame Sans Merci
description: A vision of heartless beauty appears in the minds of the targets, increasing their vulnerability to fire and cold by 50% and giving them a -4 penalty to all defenses for 2 rounds. Affects enemies within 1 square of the target (no save).

name: Leap of the Black Deer
description: The witch gains +5 Dexterity for the current turn.

name: Mage Armor
description: An invisible field of force surrounds the caster, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC for 20 rounds per level.

name: Mage Bolt
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Magic Stone
description: Caster launches a small stone that automatically hits a target for 1d3+1 points of damage. Additional stones are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five stones at 9th level and beyond.

name: Major Arrow of Kleos
description: The adventurer sends forth an arrow of discordium that hits an enemy within 5 squares for 3d4+4 Magic Damage (no save).

name: Make Them Tremble!
description: The adventurer's cries throw off the party's foes. Enemies within 5 squares of the adventurer take -4 Reflex and -1 AC for 1 round (no save).

name: Mass Minor Healing
description: Heals all party members for 8 HP each.

name: Mechanical Acuity
description: A portion of enemies within 5 squares of the adventurer take -4 Reflex for 1 round (no save).

name: Minor Arrow of Kleos
description: The adventurer sends forth an arrow of discordium that hits an enemy within 5 squares for 1d3+3 Magic Damage.

name: Minor Healing
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 8 hitpoints

name: Minor Regeneration
description: Places a minor regeneration effect on a PC that lasts for 4 rounds giving the PC 2 hit points of healing per round.

name: Moderate Healing
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 16 hitpoints

name: Natural Philosophy
description: A portion of enemies within 5 squares of the adventurer take double damage from Poison, Fire, Cold, Acid, and Electricity for 1 round (no save).

name: Oak Father's Limbs
description: The adventurer gains +5 Strength for the current turn.

name: Old Meg, She Gave Them Succor
description: Highlights *Healing *Area effect Details A serving of spiritual tea refreshes the witch and her allies, healing them for 1d7 HP for every 3 levels the witch has.

name: One Wyrd Trick
description: A portion of enemies within 5 squares of the witch take -4 Will, -4 Reflex, and -4 Fortitude for 1 round (no save).

name: Opaque Amber Charge
description: The adventurer launches an alchemical grenade to a point within 2 squares, doing 3d6 electricity damage to each creature affected unless the creature succeeds on a DC 11 reflex check.

name: Orison of the Four Mendicants
description: The adventurer's prayer beseeches the Perfect Light to purge imperfections, removing all debuffs from a single target adjacent to the adventurer.

name: Outmaneuver
description: The adventurer chips away at a foe's physical and mental reserves, making an enemy in an adjacent square take -2 AC  and Immobility for 1 round (no save), and injuring them for 2 HP.

name: Pilgrim's Orison
description: The adventurer's prayer for wayfarers in need heals 2d4 HP for every three levels the adventurer has.

name: Please Do Sleep, Wee Children!
description: The witch's lullaby affects an area within 5 squares, making any enemy within it who fails a DC 11 Will save incapable of movement or action for 3 rounds or until injured.

name: Precise Strike
description: The adventure concentrates on landing a grievous but not unsurpassable blow, doing 5 HP of Physical Damage to an enemy within 1 square.

name: Prithee Sleep, Cruel Babes!
description: Highlights *No damage *Area effect *Makes enemies incapable of moving or acting Details The witch sings an ancient lullaby. Targeted enemies who fail a DC 11 Will save are incapable of movement or action for 3 rounds or until injured.

name: Red Fox in the Snow
description: Highlights *Moderate to high damage *Single enemy *Two damage types Details It is said that the fox tricks travelers into resting in the snow. With this spell, the witch calls forth the perilous cold and deceptive warmth of such a bed. The target takes 3 Cold Damage and 1d4 Fire Damage for every 2 levels the witch has. A DC 12 Fortitude Save halves the Cold Damage, while a DC 12 Will Save negates the Fire Damage.

name: Red in Tooth and Claw
description: The adventurer does 2 Physical Damage to an enemy within 1 square.

name: Refined Ghostpowder
description: The adventurer throws a flask of paralysis-inducing ghostpowder at a point within 4 squares. All creatures within 1 square of the target square suffer 2-3 poison damage and must succeed on a DC 13 Reflex or be immobilized for 2-3 rounds.

name: Ripeness Is All
description: Regain 2 SP.

name: Shake Their Resolve!
description: The adventurer's cries enfeeble the party's enemies. Enemies within 5 squares of the adventurer take -4 Fortitude and -2 Attack Bonus for 1 round (no save).

name: Slipshod Rifle
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Sow Dread in Their Hearts!
description: The adventurer's cries strike fear in the party's foes. Enemies within 5 squares of the adventurer take -4 Will and are immbolized for 1 round (no save).

name: Spider Bite Poison Minor
description: spider bite can cause poison of 1d3 for 3 rounds.

name: Summon Ally Bear (Pc)
description: An ally is summoned for x turns in this encounter.

name: Summon Ally Spider (Crt)
description: An ally is summoned for x turns in this encounter.

name: Supervitriolic Bomb
description: A cone of flames launch from the fire horn and automatically hit all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per users level.

name: Sword of Tyromachus
description: The adventurer's weapon is imbued with intention-actualizing discordium, raising Attack Bonus by 5 for 3 rounds.

name: Tactician of Great Perspicacity
description: The adventurer immobilizes an adjacent enemy for 1 round (no save).

name: Thaumaturgy
description: A portion of enemies within 5 squares of the adventurer take -50% Magic Resistance for 1 round (no save).

name: The Doctrine of Selection
description: The adventurer invokes the Perfect Light to bring a companion back from the brink. A target within 1 square recovers 4d4+5 HP and gains +2 to all defenses for 1 round.

name: The Storm-Blasted Heath
description: The witch summons a violent storm nearby. It does 1d4 electricity damage to enemies within range failing a DC 10 Reflex Save and 1d4+1 cold damage to enemies within range failing a DC 10 Fortitude Save.

name: The Sweets of Faerylond
description: The witch offers a dross-filled treat to an enemy in an adjacent square, doing 6 poison damage (no save). If the target fails a DC 13 Will save, they will be incapable of movement or action for 2 rounds as well.

name: Tinker's Ghostpowder
description: The adventurer throws a flask of paralysis-inducing ghostpowder at a point within 4 squares. All creatures within 1 square of the target square suffer 1 poison damage and must succeed on a DC 11 Reflex or be immobilized for two rounds.

name: Unstable Rind
description: Highlights *High damage *Area effect *Affects friends and enemies *Costs both HP and SP Details Knott's rind gets hot and partially explodes, doing 3d4 Fire Damage to everything within range. A successful Reflex save halves the damage. Damage increases as Knott gains levels.

name: Untried Rifle
description: The adventurer has cobbled together an experimental gun with very limited ammunition, and with it shoots one enemy within 4 squares, doing 4d6 physical damage; a successful DC 11 reflex save halves this sum.

name: Vigilant Leader
description: The adventurer restores 1 SP to adventurers within 2 squares.

name: Vitriolic Spray
description: The adventurer's experimental spray attack creates a 3-square beam within 1 square of the adventurer, doing 3d4 acid damage to each creature affected. A successful DC 11 reflex save halves the damage.

name: Wallop
description: Knott headbutts an enemy, automatically hitting for 1d4+4 physical damage. A target failing a DC 12 reflex save is also immobilized for 2 rounds.

name: Web
description: Fills a 3x3 square area with sticky spiderweds.

name: Will to Live
description: The adventurer gains 4 HP.

name: Witch-Hammer
description: The adventurer gives a single enemy an incendiary rebuke, doing 1d4 fire damage and 1 magic damage every round for 3 rounds; damage begins when the enemy acts.

name: Working Rifle
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Bless
description: All allies receive a +1 to their BAB for 5 rounds per level of the caster.

name: Blast of Light
description: A blast of light launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 2d6 points of damage.

name: Sleep
description: Puts creatures to sleep for 2 rounds.
